This document demonstrates how to implement the Clusternomics model in Stan.


## Data

We use the [breast cancer](https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/eg-cu/tcga/Breast-TCGA.zip) data from TCGA.
```{r loadData}
load('../data/Breast-TCGA/Breast.RData')
class(X)
names(X)
length(X)
lapply(X, dim)
X
```
